title: Why u hate me

replies.body: Please stop the spam... or else the mods will have to bring you down and ban you from the forums aswell

replies.body: They don't hate you... they're just doing their job. Appeal at support@avicus.net. I feel it was kind of harsh to perm ban you for excessive infractions... but that's up to dylan.

replies.body:

This is your last warning, I will not hesitate to webban you if you continue to make spam topics like this.
